articles.title: Q1 FY25 results today: HCL Tech, IREDA, 5Paisa among 14 companies to announce earnings on July 12 | Company Business News - Mint
articles.description: Q1 results today: A total of 14 companies are expected to announce quarterly results today. HCL Technologies is expected to report a revenue decline of ~2% on a quarter-on-quarter basis due to seasonal issues.
